description.title: A human. Being.
description.description: I am a full stack developer currently working in Intercloud Ltd., Bangladesh as a software engineer. I have a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science and Engineering from Chittagond University and Technology. In my university years, I have participated in various competitive programming contests. CS is not only my professional background but also and above all has been a passion for myself. In Intercloud Ltd., I work as a software engineer in their cloud system department. My work here includes building and integrating various features for their public cloud system.
